name: Net and Trident
text: Your skill with lighter weapons allows you to wield one alongside your net.
prerequisites: Dex 15, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, Two-Weapon Fighting.
benefit: You can treat a net as a one-handed ranged weapon, allowing you to wield a light or one-handed melee weapon and still make ranged attacks with your net. When you use your light or one-handed melee weapon to attack an entangled opponent, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls and on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit.
normal: A net is a two-handed ranged weapon.
staminaText: When you use a light or one-handed melee weapon to attack an opponent entangled by your net, you can spend up to 5 stamina points when you hit the opponent to gain a bonus on the damage roll equal to double the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你能在挥舞你的网时熟练地使用轻型武器。
prerequisites_zh: 敏捷15，擅长异种武器（网），捕网熟练，双武器格斗。
benefit_zh: 你可以将网作为一件单手远程武器使用，这允许你再装备一件轻型或单手近战武器，同时仍可以使用网进行远程攻击。当你使用你的轻型或单手近战武器攻击一个陷入纠缠的敌人时，你的攻击检定、伤害骰和重击确认骰获得+2加值。
normal_zh: 网是一种双手远程武器。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用轻型或者单手近战武器对一个被你的捕网纠缠住的敌人进行攻击时，你可以在击中敌人时消耗至多5点耐力来在伤害骰上获得加值，这个加值等于你消耗耐力的两倍。
